text: @PressSec @applegherl @PressSec it breaks my heart that you’ve a young child & won’t wear a mask AND you attend 45’s COVID-19 endangered rallies. If nothing else your ever-present lying could be stifled by a mask. Amazing you call yourself a Christian with all the lies that come out of your mouth.
